column4: is there a god of Ubuntu sound here?  I have been here a number of times with no luck..........my Gateway 4520GZ remains mute.......... the web had quite a few threads showing that there is an issie with this sound card but the suggestions they give donothing for mine. according to other OPs here,my system "thinks" that it is playing sound, but nothing is actuallly playd
the guy that knows the most about sound in ubuntu is currently asleep because he had to take allergy medicine
ok, ty, what is a good time to catch him................ tell him, to get well soon,ifyou see him
you may want to hang out in #ubuntu-audio-help, though its 2am in our time zone
